title: Examples
para: In this section we would like to present some examples for using the DVB API.
NOTE: This section is out of date, and the code below won't even compile. Please refer to the libdvbv5 for updated/recommended examples.

section.title: Tuning
section.para: We will start with a generic tuning subroutine that uses the frontend and SEC, as well as the demux devices. The example is given for QPSK tuners, but can easily be adjusted for QAM.

The program assumes that you are using a universal LNB and a standard DiSEqC switch with up to 4 addresses. Of course, you could build in some more checking if tuning was successful and maybe try to repeat the tuning process. Depending on the external hardware, i.e. LNB and DiSEqC switch, and weather conditions this may be necessary.
